Package swingtree.animation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Animation
    An animation is a function which is called repeatedly during its lifetime, which is determined by a Schedule and a StopCondition.
    AnimationState
    The state of an animation at a given point in time.
    StopCondition  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animate
    An API for creating an Animation and defining how it should be executed.
    Schedule
    A schedule is used to define when an animation should start and how long it should run.
